author: RTÉ News
title: Virus 'will be with us for a long time': WHO
description: Covid-19 will stalk the planet for a long time to come, the World Health Organization has said, warning that most countries are still in the early stages of tackling the pandemic.
content:
Covid-19 will stalk the planet for a long time to come, the World Health Organization has said, warning that most countries are still in the early stages of tackling the pandemic.
WHO boss Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said some countries that thought they had … [+2933 chars]
